author: boisvert
msg: * Scala 2.9.0-1 is now default, along with ScalaCheck 1.9, ScalaTest 1.4.1 and Specs 1.6.8.
* ScalaCheck, ScalaTest and Specs now default to sane versions when using older Scala versions.
